name: Face Detection
descr: Detect faces on an image or a video, based on Artificial Neural Networks. Requires a video. Produces a video and a CSV file with coordinates of the detected faces.

options.text: Input file pattern of the image, or video file
Maximum number of faces to select among those detected (0=auto)
Minimum confidence score to select detected faces
Consider the portrait instead of the face in output image(s)
Save coordinates of detected faces in a CSV file
Save result in a folder with image files -- if video input only
Surround the detected faces in the output image(s)
Save detected faces in cropped images
Resize all the cropped images to a fixed width (0=no)
Resize all the cropped images to a fixed height (0=no)
